dashboard_storage_remaining_widget_descr: Storage consumed include both source file size and sizes of renditions
dashboard_number_of_videos_widget_descri: The number of VOD assets in your account
dashboard_impressions_widget_description: An "Impression" is seeing a video, even if you don't click play
dashboard_play_rate_vs_impressions_widge: The proportion of people who click play
dashboard_balance_widget_description: Your current paywall balance as of today
dashboard_revenue_widget_description: The paywall revenue you have earned for the last 30 days
dashboard_free_trial_expired_thirty_day_: Your trial has ended, Upgrade Now
Or Contact Us in order to request more testing
dashboard_free_trial_almost_expired_thir: Your free trial is about to end, Upgrade Now
dashboard_free_trial_tutorial_widget_row: How to start streaming with OBS
How to start streaming with Wirecast
How to embed on your website
How to customize the player theme
How to add security to your video: password protection, geo and referencing
dashboard_free_trial_faq_widget_descript: Have some questions relating to the free trial?
common_header_free_trial_upgrade_button_: Gain access to more premium features. Upgrade Now
live_stream_create_modal_help_text: Need help creating a Live Stream? Visit the Knowledge Base
live_stream_create_modal_region_dropdown: The region your stream will broadcast from. Select the one closest to your encoder for best performance.
live_stream_create_modal_renditions_drop: For multi-bitrate streaming, select the number of renditions you will encode and stream to Dacast.
common_free_trial_limitation_panel_addit: Any questions regarding your trial features? Our team will be more than happy to assist you. Contact Us now.
common_content_general_embed_code_info_t: The Embed Code can add content to your website and the Share Link can be shared on social media.
live_stream_general_live_recording_info_: Live recording is a great feature. However, this action can sometimes be unreliable due to many factors beyond our control (e.g. your internet connection), the industry best practices recommend to also setup local recording through your encoder.
live_stream_general_live_recording_limit: 8 continuous hours recording limit at a time. Live Stream recording turns off after 7 days and can be turned on again.
live_stream_general_countdown_limitation: Note that a Paywall can stop this from being displayed.
common_content_general_images_info_text: Upload image assets for your content.
common_content_general_images_splashscre: Displayed before playback and when your content is offline
Minimum 480px x 480px, formats: JPG, PNG, SVG, GIF
common_content_general_images_change_spl: Upload a file for your Splashscreen
common_content_general_images_thumbnail_: A small image used in Playlists
Always 160px x 90px, formats: JPG, PNG, SVG, GIF
common_content_general_images_poster_inf: A large image that you can use for any purpose
live_stream_general_encoder_modal_info_t: Correct <1>Encoder Setup</1> is required - <3>contact us</3> if you need help.
live_stream_general_encoder_modal_url_fi: This is your server address for live streaming.
live_stream_general_encoder_modal_backup: This is your backup stream in case the Server/Stream URL/ Address does not work.
live_stream_general_encoder_modal_stream: This is the name/key for a rendition of your stream.
live_stream_general_encoder_modal_obs_ve: For OBS Studio Versions prior to 27.0.0, please use <1>Generic RTMP Encoder settings.</1>
live_stream_general_encoder_modal_guide_: Quick guide for live streaming with <1>{{encoderName}}</1>
common_modal_unsaved_changes_text_1: Are you sure that you want to leave this page?
common_modal_unsaved_changes_text_2: Please note any unsaved changes will be lost.
common_content_paywall_toggle_descriptio: Quickly enable or disable the paywall for this content.
common_content_paywall_intro_vod_id_text: This video will play before the content is purchased. Provide the Content ID, which can be found in the General tab of your Video on Demand asset.
common_paywall_promo_modal_alphanumerico: Minimum 5 characters. You can use both letters and numerals. Every code must be unique.
common_content_engagement_bubble_info_te: When the section is locked, the settings are inherited from your Global Engagement Settings. Click the to override these settings. To revert back to your Global Engagement Settings you can click the padlock again.
common_engagement_ads_text_1: Ads configured here will apply to all your content and can be overridden individually. Be aware that Mid-roll ads will only play if the video/stream duration is long enough.
common_engagement_ads_text_2: Need help creating Ads? Visit the <1>Knowledge Base</1>
common_engagement_ads_info_text: Create a new Ad before enabling Advertising
common_engagement_ga_text_1: Capture video engagment and track data in Google Analytics.
common_engagement_ga_text_2: Need help with Google Analytics? Visit the <1>Knowledge Base</1>
common_engagement_brand_image_text: This will display on the video player on top of the content.
common_engagement_brand_image_drag_and_d: Image will automatically adjust if bigger than your player.
common_engagement_brand_image_image_size: 2 MB max file size, image formats: JPG, PNG, SVG, GIF
common_engagement_brand_text_brand_text_: Use content title as Brand Text
common_engagement_end_screen_info_text: This will be displayed when the content ends.
common_content_security_bubble_info: These settings are different from your global Security Settings - click the to revert to global settings.
common_security_password_protection_info: Viewers must enter a password before viewing the content.
common_security_content_scheduling_info_: The content will only be available between the times/dates you provide.
common_content_security_geo_restriction_: Restrict access to specific locations worldwide. Manage your Geo-Restriction Groups in your Security Settings.
common_content_security_domain_control_i: Restrict access to specific domain names on the internet. Manage your Domain Control Groups in your Security Settings.
common_content_theme_bubble_info: If you wish to create a new Theme or edit a Theme, go to Theming.
common_theme_player_controls_tooltip: The controls at the bottom of the player
common_theme_big_play_button_tooltip: The big button in the middle before playback starts
common_theme_miniature_tooltip: Thumbnails when hovering over the video scrubber (time bar)
common_theme_download_button_tooltip: Whether viewers can download the video
common_theme_social_sharing_tooltip: Whether viewers can see links to share content on social media
common_theme_embed_code_tooltip: Whether viewers can see and copy the embed code for the content
common_theme_overlay_color_tooltip: The primary color of the player
common_theme_menu_color_tooltip: The secondary color of the player
common_theme_start_muted_tooltip: Whether the content is muted by default
common_theme_looping_toggle_title: Whether the content will start again when it reaches the end
common_theme_view_counter_tooltip: Whether viewers can see how many people are currently watching
common_theme_offline_message_tooltip: The text to show viewers when the content is not online
common_analytics_concurrent_viewers_tool: Concurrent Viewers represents an approximative number of active sessions on your stream. It is able to report on large numbers of concurrent viewers, however you may see some discrepancies when the number is unusually low.
uploader_encoding_recipe_tooltip: Use our Standard Recipe, or go to Encoding to create your own Encoding Recipes
uploader_drag_and_drop_instruction: Drag and drop to upload or
video_general_subtitle_info_text: Add subtitles to improve the accessibility of your content.
video_general_subtitle_upload_instructio: Max file size is 1MB, File srt or vtt
video_general_subtitle_utf8_info_text: Uncheck if you have already converted your file to UTF-8.
video_chapters_table_placeholder: Select positions in video to add as chapter markers
video_renditions_description: Add or delete transcoding options from your file. Please note that adding bitrates to your file requires encoding and also extra storage space.
video_renditions_help_text: Need help understanding Renditions? Visit the <1>Knowledge Base</1>
expo_create_expo_modal_help_text: Need help creating an Expo? Visit the <1>Knowledge Base</1>
common_content_setup_info_text: Either select content dynamically from a Folder or statically from specific pieces of content
expo_design_info_text: Customize the look of your expo
expo_design_dark_mode_description: Change design to a dark theme.
expo_design_cover_info_text: Show a header image or color.
expo_design_contents_description_info_te: Show the descriptions of all content.
expo_design_featured_content_info_text: Fix one piece of content at the top.
playlist_create_modal_help_text: Need help creating a Playlist? Visit the <1>Knowledge Base</1>
playlist_theme_thumbnail_position_text: The position of the links to other content in the Playlist
playlist_theme_continuous_play_info_text: Whether the next piece of content will start automatically when the current one finishes
playlist_theme_skip_content_info_text: Whether thumbnails are displayed, allowing viewers to skip from one video to another
paywall_presets_price_table_description: Presets allow you to apply a set of prices to your content in one action.
paywall_presets_price_table_help_text: Need help setting up a Price Preset? Visit the <1>Knowledge Base</1>
paywall_presets_promo_table_help_text: Need help setting up a Promo Preset? Visit the Knowledge Base
paywall_groups_price_description: Group content into a single Price Group that can be purchased together.
paywall_groups_price_help_text: Need help setting up a Group Price ? Visit the <1>Knowledge Base</1>
paywall_groups_promo_description: Allow a promo to be used to purchase content in a Price Group.
paywall_groups_promo_help_text: Need help setting up a Group Promo? Visit the <1>Knowledge Base</1>
paywall_withdrawals_payment_method_table: Add a Withdrawal Method so you can withdraw money from your Paywall balance
paywall_withdrawals_payment_method_descr: Add ways to receive withdrawals from your paywall balance.
paywall_withdrawals_payment_method_form_: Please Select which method you would like to add
If you have multiple payout methods of the same type, this name will help you
paywall_withdrawals_requests_description: Request a withdrawal from your available paywall balance (i.e. total paywall balance minus sum of pending requests).
paywall_withdrawals_requests_table_empty: You must add a Payment Request Method before you can Request a Withdrawal
paywall_withdrawals_requests_modal_delay: *Your first payment request will be delayed at least 35 days
paywall_theme_description: Configure the look and feel of your paywall.
paywall_theme_help_text: Need help setting up a Paywall Theme? Visit the <1>Knowledge Base</1>
paywall_theme_splashcreen_decription: The Splash Screen is shown when the viewer first sees the paywall.
paywall_theme_login_description: The Login Screen is shown before the user is allowed to purchase the content.
paywall_theme_login_text: Already have access? Login with your account
paywall_settings_card_purchase_descripti: Allow your viewers to purchase using cards on the paywall.
paywall_settings_paypal_description: Allow your viewers to purchase using PayPal on the paywall.
paywall_settings_custom_tos_description: If you need viewers to accept your TOS, enter the URL (starting with https://) here.
paywall_settings_card_statement_descript: This is displayed on your viewers' bank statements.
settings_encoding_page_description: Encoding recipes allow you to encode your videos during upload so they can be played immediately.
settings_encoding_page_help_text: Need help understanding Encoding Recipes? Visit the <1>Knowledge Base</1>
settings_encoding_modal_watermark_descri: Add a watermark to videos to help prevent plagiarism
settings_encoding_modal_preset_descripti: Provide your audience with the best viewing experience. Select up to 6 encoding presets from the table below and we will encode based on your choices.
settings_encoding_modal_preset_help_text: Need help choosing your presets? Visit the <1>Knowledge Base</1>
settings_embed_size_description: Choose how you wish to embed your videos.
settings_embed_size_responsive_descripti: Your videos will automatically resize to fit their container.
settings_embed_size_fixed_description: Videos will default to a fixed width with their height determined automatically based on aspect ratio.
settings_security_global_info_text: These global settings can be overriden by editing a specific piece of content (Video, Live Stream etc.)
settings_integration_api_keys_descriptio: Prior to using or testing the API, you have to generate an API key. Please click the button below to generate a key attached to your account. This key will authenticate your api requests on the Dacast platform.
settings_integration_api_keys_doc: Our API documentation is publicly available <1>here</1>.
settings_theme_global_info: Themes specify how your video player will look and behave for Live Streams, Videos and Playlists.
settings_theme_help_text: Need help creating a Theme? Visit the <1>Knowledge Base</1>
account_plan_modal_help_text: Need help with purchasing additional data? Visit the <1>Knowledge Base</1>
account_plan_modal_change_payment_info_t: If you wish to use a different Payment Method, please go to Billing and add a new Payment Method
account_plan_modal_terms_text: By purchasing this product I acknowledge and accept the Terms and Conditions.
account_plan_playback_protection_descrip: Automatically buy more Data when you run out to ensure your content never stops playing, even if you use all your data.
account_plan_playback_protection_disable: If you disable Playback Protection then your content will no longer be viewable if you run out of data.
account_plan_additional_data_description: Manually purchase more data when you run out so that your content can keep playing.
account_plan_additional_data_high_purcha: Contact us for purchases over 100 TB
